title: Implement config/session_manager.py
description:
Implement singleton SessionManager following otb-agents pattern.

## Reference
/Users/jaidevk/Work/dev/otb-agents/config/session_manager.py

## Pattern
```python
from google.adk.sessions import InMemorySessionService

class SessionManager:
    _instance = None
    _session_service = None

    def __new__(cls):
        if cls._instance is None:
            cls._instance = super().__new__(cls)
            cls._session_service = InMemorySessionService()
        return cls._instance

    @property
    def session_service(self):
        return self._session_service
```
